channel.title: Transformers
channel.description:
The Movie looks great with a good story board. Starring - Shia LaBeouf, Megan Fox, Josh Duhamel, Tyrese Gibson, Rachael Taylor, Anthony Anderson, Jon Voight, John Turturro. Directed by Michael Bay, A Great action packed movie with many great features.
Check out [url=http://www.myspace.com/transformers]http://www.myspace.com/transformers[/url] for some more transformer information. I think its going to be a good action movie and it says there is some comedy in it, but we have to see the movie first =]. Anyway whats your opinion for the movie Transformers? [i]My Opinion[/i] - Alot of people thought that transformers would be another cartoon "adventure". But after they saw some previews, hopefully they changed their mind.
Thanks for reading,
- Boring

item.title: Transformers
item.dc:creator: @Thebeanie TheBeanie
item.description:
@Thebeanie wrote:

I saw it today in the movies and i can honestly say i thought it wouldnt be to good… but when i saw it it was AWESOME. Very good special effects… Very good action scenes with a touch of comedy to !

It Is one of the best movies i have seen in years.
